extracted_playbook.title: Update Rockwell Automation Software
extracted_playbook.description: Update to V33.017, V34.014, V35.013, or V36.011 to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure control system devices and systems are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: Use secure methods like VPNs for remote access, ensuring VPNs are updated to the latest version.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment before deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited emails. Refer to guidance on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
